verses.verse: And it came to pass,<WH1961> that when Jeremiah<WH3414> had made an end<WH3615> of speaking<WH1696> unto<WH413> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> <WH853> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> their God,<WH430> for which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> their God<WH430> had sent<WH7971> him to<WH413> them, even<WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words,<WH1697>

Then spoke<WH559> Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Hoshaiah,<WH1955> and Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah,<WH7143> and all<WH3605> the proud<WH2086> men,<WH376> saying<WH559> unto<WH413> Jeremiah,<WH3414> Thou<WH859> speakest<WH1696> falsely:<WH8267> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> hath not<WH3808> sent<WH7971> thee to say,<WH559> Go<WH935> not<WH3808> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn<WH1481> there: <WH8033>

But <WH3588> Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah<WH5374> setteth thee on<WH5496> <WH853> against us, for<WH4616> to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans,<WH3778> that they might put us to death,<WH4191> <WH853> and carry us away captives<WH1540> <WH853> into Babylon.<WH894>

So Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah,<WH7143> and all<WH3605> the captains<WH8269> of the forces,<WH2428> and all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> obeyed<WH8085> not<WH3808> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD,<WH3068> to dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Judah.<WH3063>

But Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah,<WH7143> and all<WH3605> the captains<WH8269> of the forces,<WH2428> took<WH3947> <WH853> all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of Judah,<WH3063> that<WH834> were returned<WH7725> from all<WH4480> <WH3605> nations,<WH1471> whither<WH834> <WH8033> they had been driven,<WH5080> to dwell<WH1481> in the land<WH776> of Judah;<WH3063>

Even <WH853> men,<WH1397> and women,<WH802> and children,<WH2945> and the king's<WH4428> daughters,<WH1323> and every<WH3605> person<WH5315> that<WH834> Nebuzaradan<WH5018> the captain<WH7227> of the guard<WH2876> had left<WH5117> with<WH854> Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> and Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet,<WH5030> and Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah.<WH5374>
So they came into<WH935> the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> for<WH3588> they obeyed<WH8085> not<WH3808> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD:<WH3068> thus came<WH935> they even to<WH5704> Tahpanhes.<WH8471>
Then came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> Jeremiah<WH3414> in Tahpanhes,<WH8471> saying,<WH559>

Take <WH3947> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in thine hand,<WH3027> and hide<WH2934> them in the clay<WH4423> in the brickkiln,<WH4404> which<WH834> is at the entry<WH6607> of Pharaoh's<WH6547> house<WH1004> in Tahpanhes,<WH8471> in the sight<WH5869> of the men<WH376> of Judah;<WH3064>

And say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> the God<WH430> of Israel;<WH3478> Behold,<WH2009> I will send<WH7971> and take<WH3947> <WH853> Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> my servant,<WH5650> and will set<WH7760> his throne<WH3678> upon<WH4480> <WH4605> these<WH428> stones<WH68> that<WH834> I have hid;<WH2934> and he shall spread<WH5186> <WH853> his royal pavilion<WH8237> over<WH5921> them.

And when he cometh,<WH935> he shall smite<WH5221> <WH853> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and deliver such<WH834> as are for death<WH4194> to death;<WH4194> and such<WH834> as are for captivity<WH7628> to captivity;<WH7628> and such<WH834> as are for the sword<WH2719> to the sword.<WH2719>

And I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in the houses<WH1004> of the gods<WH430> of Egypt;<WH4714> and he shall burn<WH8313> them, and carry them away captives:<WH7617> and he shall array himself<WH5844> with<WH854> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> as<WH834> a shepherd<WH7462> putteth on<WH5844> <WH853> his garment;<WH899> and he shall go forth<WH3318> from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> in peace.<WH7965>

He shall break<WH7665> also<WH853> the images<WH4676> of Beth-shemesh,<WH1053> that<WH834> is in the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714> and the houses<WH1004> of the gods<WH430> of the Egyptians<WH4714> shall he burn<WH8313> with fire.<WH784>
